name: Impact
tagline: A small JavaFX app written in Scala that finds the impact factor of scientific journals.
body:
## Installation Instructions

1. Download the latest version of [JRE 8](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html) for your operating system and install it.
2. Download (Impact)[#] and extract it to a folder of your choice.
3. Double-click `app.jar` to run the app.

## Features

* Get the latest impact factor for thousands of journals.
* Accepts as many journals as you want, each on a separate line.
* Export results to CSV for future use.
* Relatively low memory usage (around 70 MB on Windows).
* Works on all major operating systems (Windows, Mac OS X, Linux).

## Screenshots

![Main interface](http://i.imgur.com/QmqZIJw.png)
![Results found](http://i.imgur.com/gzVJLa3.png)
![CSV export](http://i.imgur.com/e5Vh9kd.png)
